acceptance_criteria: The game should maintain a consistent level of challenge.
stories.so_that: I can enjoy the game without it being too easy or too hard
supporting_reviews: Pretty fun game. Challenging yet beatable
Fun for the first 3 or 4 levels but even the easy difficulty is too hard
It's a pretty fun TD game, very simple strategy that takes critical thinking as the levels get harder.

acceptance_criteria: New levels should be added to the game.
The new content is engaging and challenging.
stories.so_that: I can continue enjoying the game
supporting_reviews: Game is great but there's not enough content
Love all Kingdom Rush games, I've played them all several times. Please make more! This original one is my favorite though, just wish there were more levels.

acceptance_criteria: The game should remain free of intrusive ads.
Any ads should not disrupt gameplay.
stories.so_that: I can enjoy an uninterrupted gaming experience
supporting_reviews: Good killing time game. Not a lot of adds.

I was looking for a casual game that doesn't have ads popping up everytime for some double rewards and stuff. And this is a perfect game. No forced ads at all and the game play and difficulty is also well balanced.
Love it. No ads just clean and happy gaming

acceptance_criteria: Purchased characters should always be accessible.
stories.so_that: I don't lose my in-game purchases
supporting_reviews: for some reason its do not showing character that I have purchased. when deleting my 2nd g mail it showed again. the problem is I can't access my paid character when login in 2nd Gmail.

acceptance_criteria: Game progress should be restorable after reinstalling the app
stories.i_want: lost heroes to be restored or a way for the user to self-restore
stories.so_that: users do not lose progress when they reinstall the app
supporting_reviews: I like this game very well but i stop playing for a while and deleted it but when i installed it back some of my heroes is gone it was a bundle that has thor, oni, and ignus. Hopping for some help thank you

acceptance_criteria: Game should resume correctly after being minimized
stories.i_want: the game to not reset progress when minimized
stories.so_that: I can easily switch apps and not lose progress.
supporting_reviews: The only thing I don't like about this one (which is why it gets 4 stars ), is that if you leave the game to answer a text message or do something else, you can lose your game. For a few seconds is okay, but after that it sometimes restarts, so you loose your progress in the particular level you're on.

acceptance_criteria: The suggested tower upgrades should be considered
New upgrade options should be balanced.
stories.so_that: the game has more strategic depth
supporting_reviews: This is good but we need new upgrade of Tesla x104 like knight barracks. Tesla can multiple lightning chance 100% see my comments recommend

acceptance_criteria: The game's overall positive attributes are acknowledged.
stories.i_want: to see general praise for the game
stories.so_that: I can understand what aspects players enjoy most
supporting_reviews: I absolutely adore this game. It has fun gameplay, you can have up to three different save slots, and it's easy to learn how to play!
Love this game , i used to play it as a kid 10/10
Fun game, nice progression, would recommend
excellent game. fun to play. easy to pick up. hard to put down sometimes.
Pretty fun game. Challenging yet beatable
good game without any purchase needed. Thanks for the selfless service guys

You know, i've played this game multiple times over the past like ten years, and I don't think i've ever rated it. So here's 5 stars for being a great company that makes damn good tower defense games!
Such a great game!I'm not a Facebook mom yall
Not what I was expecting. Fun and challenging.
Brilliant brilliant absolutely brilliant loving the game
The game is good. The challenges are quite hard. I haven't found anything that I dislike so far. GG's.
Only Sigma Alpha males play this game. I am neither and yet I still love this game, OwO
The gold standard for what mobile games should be. No pervasive, predatory ads, wholesome content, and actual strategy-based gameplay that can keep you busy.
The best game l ever seen
Greatest single player game literally no issue
Unique, loved playing years ago on PC.
This is the greatest tower defense game of all time. Perfect accuracy. I am nostalgic for such a time in gaming, and this is actually mobile gaming. 10/10 would play again.
5 stars for "All your base are belong to us"
Some of my favorite games since I was a kid,
I absolutely love this game Tower Defense done correctly
Really love the game! Not so easy TD
This game is full of nostelgia for me
Very fun and challenging, super simple to get the hang of yet you can approach it with a variety of techniques. I really enjoy this game and it has lots of cute little hidden details.
It's probably the best tower defence game I've ever played.

Honestly, its one of the hardest TD games ive ever played. You really need a lot of strategy to win this game, its overall really fun and there are harder difficulties to make your life a living hell :)

I've been playing this game for years and I still keep coming back to it. All of the games in this series are amazing, and I eagerly anticipate everything the series drops. Start here if you like tower defense games that don't try to sell you stuff or make you watch ANY ads at all. It's literally amazing. If you have a lot of time to kill I'd highly recommend this series of games.
This game make me stressssssssssss. Other than that it's pretty good and fun to play. Good thing it's offline.
Been playing this games for such long time. Recommended,
One of the best I played in a while,
Good game that is not pay to win,
Ironhide game studies create the best games in the world. They are soo fun to play.
very good game good should play with friends will be more fun than playing alone makes me autistic
It's fun to play and to kill time if you have nothing to do or are waiting at a doctors office or something like that. It's easy to learn the basic strategy and the rest is just fun
